A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing it three times\, I'm finally starting to come around on TLJ. The stuff I hated about it the first time\, I still hate and it still brings the movie down a few notches\, but I have a greater appreciation for the elements that did work. Ultimately\, it's still a middle-of-the-pack SW movie\, but not a horrible travesty either.
